trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> sub-tree for the data items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>子樹系中的資料項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: When data items are shown in UI, the system creates a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> sub-tree for the data items.
trans-unit.target: 當 UI 中顯示資料的項目時，系統會建立<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>資料項目樹狀子目錄。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The system also creates an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> for each data item; when the UI for the data item is created, this ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer is also created.
trans-unit.target: 系統也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>每個資料項目; 建立資料項目的 UI 時，此 ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer 也會建立。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The two peers then merge to form a single peer.
trans-unit.target: 兩個對等然後合併以形成單一的對等。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項類型<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer"></xref>.
